alert.note: Alert for Kanabec (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 13 at 8:38PM CDT until April 15 at 8:12PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...Forecast flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in Minnesota... Snake River At Mora affecting Kanabec County. .Warm temperatures will continue to melt upstream snowpack and increase river flows. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Snake River At Mora. * WHEN...Until Saturday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 800 PM CDT Thursday, the stage was 13.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 800 PM CDT Thursday was 13.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 13.2 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage early Saturday afternoon. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 12.2 feet on 10/04/2017. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
